title: Renton (Dr.)
body: _Dr._ An English physician who resided in Madeira for many years and published a work on the advantages of the island's climate in the treatment of pulmonary diseases in the _Edinburgh Medical and Surgical Journal_ (1827). He made various meteorological observations in Funchal, in collaboration with Dr. Heineken, from 1826 to 1831.

Funchal: Where he made various meteorological observations

Dr. Heineken: Collaborated with Dr. Renton in the meteorological observations

1827: Dr. Renton published a work on the advantages of the island's climate in the treatment of pulmonary diseases
1826: Dr. Renton began collaborating with Dr. Heineken in the meteorological observations
1831: Dr. Renton ended the collaboration with Dr. Heineken in the meteorological observations
